Description: I have had sore throat and shortness of breath, tight chest since last Monday. 8 days later and symptoms are not going away. No runny nose. I have been exposed to travelers. Should I go for covid test?
DialogueText:
Patient:
I have had sore throat and shortness of breath, tight chest since last Monday. 8 days later and symptoms are not going away. No runny nose. I have been exposed to travelers. Should I go for covid test?
Doctor:
Yes. yes.
